Letters to the Editor

Supporting schools helps build up the county

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: It was not long ago that incentive packages and speed to market were at the top of the lists for corporate site selectors looking for places to build factories and distribution centers. Not anymore. Today, talent acquisition is almost always No. 1, which is almost always ...

Physics, health insurance, politics and more

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: Hats off to the local high school teacher who reported her physics students said physics is hard in a televised report on a local competition for students. Well, yes, I agree. Physics is hard. My physics and mathematics are way behind me, but not totally forgotten. So, when a ...

John Barco shows clear understanding of duties

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: Being sheriff is no easy job. It comes with a whole host of administrative responsibilities most law enforcement officers aren’t accustomed to dealing with. However, John Barco shows his clear understanding of the job, and his ability to execute it in the best interest of ...

Email looking for a response from councilmembers

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: Recently, I sent an email to every single member of Warren City council, expressing my intense displeasure of another company asking for a handout. I’m referring to Dawn Inc. and the request for the 100% tax abatement for a new building on Sferra Boulevard. Kudos to Councilman ...

Regulate retail sales and marketing of vaping

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: I am writing to bring attention to the increased use of vaping among the youth of Warren. Vapes, or cigarettes, as they are sometimes called, are marketed to teenagers and young adults by huge corporations who are missing their cigarette profits. We need to make our young ...

Hernandez has the right tools to be his ‘own man’

March 10, 2024

DEAR EDITOR: Rick Hernandez has proven himself as a trustee in Hubbard Township. He has helped the Hubbard Joint Fire District grow from a volunteer to a full-time staffed department. Some of his greatest attributes are his negotiation skills and his ability to build relationships that will ...
